Detailed Description

Definition of a system message object.

This object is used to display debug and error messages on screen. By en- or disbaling certain channels it is possible to hide e.g. debug messages for release software. Only one single system messgae object can exist at a time. Use the SYSMSG_create function for creation of a system message object.
